format._instruction: If file instances within this bundle are organized and formatted according to a formal data structure use the appropriate contentType. Leave blank otherwise.
format.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
format.title: format

patternOfFilenames._instruction: Enter a regular expression (syntax: ECMA 262) which is valid for all filenames of the file instances that should be grouped into this file bundle.
patternOfFilenames.description: Reliable sample / structure of characters valid for all names in a particular collection of files.
patternOfFilenames.title: patternOfFilenames

groupedBy._instruction: Add the concept which was used to group file instances into this file bundle.
groupedBy.description: Reference to the aspect used to group something.
groupedBy.title: groupedBy

hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file bundle.
hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
hash.title: hash

isPartOf._instruction: Add the file bundle or file repository this file bundle is a part of.
isPartOf.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
isPartOf.title: isPartOf

name._instruction: Enter the name of this file bundle.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: name

storageSize._instruction: Enter the storage size this file bundle allocates.
storageSize.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
storageSize.title: storageSize

description: Structured information on a bundle of file instances.
